data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Neumann, Dirk, Stiassny, Melanie L. J., Schliewen, Ulrich K. (2011): Two new sympatric Sarotherodon species (Pisces: Cichlidae) endemic to Lake Ejagham, Cameroon, west-central Africa, with comments on the Sarotherodon galilaeus species complex. Zootaxa 2765: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203566
